channel.title: Posts on Example Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Example Site

item.title: First
item.description: 安装windows下包管理工具 scoop 默认安装路径：C:\Users\jiangfb\scoop set-executionpolicy remotesigned -scope currentuser # 需科学 iex (new-object net.webclient).downloadstring('https://get.scoop.sh') 安装hugo 默认安装路径：C:\Users\jiangfb\scoop\shims\hugo.exe 最好科学 scoop install hugo-extended 安装go 默认安装路径：C:\Users\jiangfb\scoop\apps\go scoop install go@1.16.5
